title: Help: In Game Computer Completely Freeze and Forced to Restart

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, it's possible this is caused by the Windows Game Bar, which has a feature called *Game DVR* that has caused freezing and low FPS in the past. I'd recommend disabling this feature using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if anything does.
